properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 6:50PM CST until January 11 at 3:13PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Oklahoma...

Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties.

Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair...Cherokee and Delaware
Counties.

Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County.

Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties.

Baron Fork River at Eldon affecting Cherokee County.

Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County.

Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Baron Fork River at Eldon.
* from late Friday night to Saturday afternoon, or until the warning
is cancelled.
* At  6:30 PM Thursday, the stage was  6.49 feet.
* Flood stage is 18.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The Baron Fork River at Eldon is expected to rise above
flood stage early Saturday morning and continue to rise to near
18.7 feet by Saturday morning. The river is expected to fall below
flood stage late Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 18.0 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs.
